content: hüj tüb is exactly what it sounds like -- a huge tube this cowl is knit with lace weight yarn and an over-sized needle to create billowing clouds of fabric around your neck the pattern also includes tips for substituting other weights of yarn it s perfect for stash-busting palette cleansing or in-front-of-the-tv knitting pull out that skein of yarn that you ve been saving because it s too pretty to knit and put it to good use the result will be a simple elegant accessory that s not only easy to dress up or down but also easy to knit any knitter of any skill level can make this item
